summary: April 21 is the 111th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Cashbox  is a defunct music magazine that was a weekly publication devoted to the music and culture and coin-operated machine industries in the United States which was published from July 1942, to November 16, 1996. It has since been revived as an online-only weekly that occasionally publishes special issues.
title: Cash Box magazine
